instances.description: Number of GeoServer instances to launch. These are the tasks that actually provide OGC service handlers.

cpus.description: Number of cores allocated per GeoServer instance

memory.description: Amount of memory in MiBs to allocate per GeoServer instance.

haproxy-vhost.description: External address for access to the GeoServer cluster. This should be added to your DNS as an A record targeting your marathon-lb public slave.

haproxy-port.description: Internally exposed port via marathon-lb. Externally exposed ports are always HAProxy http/https ports.

data-dir.description: Absolute path present on all Mesos nodes for GeoServer configuration storage. This location must be shared across all Mesos nodes to ensure consistent GeoServer configuration.

data-dir-owner.description: User ID and group ID ownership of GeoServer configuration storage. Used within containers to match host ownership by way of gosu.

supplemental-data-dirs.description: Absolute path present on Mesos nodes of data for serving via GeoServer. Multiple values can be given delimited by commas.

sync.description: Settings used to tune the synchronization of GeoServer slaves on configuration updates.

polling-interval.description: Interval between GeoServer configuration directory file system polls.

file-blacklist.description: Comma delimited string of file name snippets that should be ignored. Snippets are compared to file names using contains.
